languages.text: Лор про работу этого места при удачной починке когитатора

traits.locale_text: Лор про работу этого места при удачной починке когитатора

languages.text: Когитатор полнится данными о работе Дворца Правосудия. Имена прислуги, списки казненных и прочее. Количество входящих в здание всегда больше количества покидающих.

The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing things such as the names of servants and details of executions. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.
languages.original_text: Когитатор полнится данными о работе Дворца Правосудия. Имена прислуги, списки казненных и прочее. Количество входящих в здание всегда больше количества покидающих.

traits.locale_text: The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing the names of servants, tallying executions, et cetera. The number of people entering the building is always greater than the number of those leaving it.

The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing the names of servants, tallying executions, et cetera. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.

The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing the names of servants, tallying executions, et cetera. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.

The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing things such as the names of servants and details of executions. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.

The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing things such as the names of servants and details of executions. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.

languages.text: Der Cogitator ist mit Daten über die Arbeitsabläufe des Justizpalastes gespeist und listet unter anderem die Namen von Dienern und Details zu Exekutionen auf. Die Zahl der Menschen, die das Gebäude betreten, ist immer größer als die Zahl derer, die es verlassen.
languages.original_text: The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing things such as the names of servants and details of executions. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.

traits.locale_text: Der Cogitator ist mit Daten über die Arbeitsabläufe des Justizpalastes gespeist und listet unter anderem die Namen von Dienern und Details zu Exekutionen auf. Die Zahl der Menschen, die das Gebäude betreten, ist immer größer als die Zahl derer, die es verlassen.

languages.text: Le cogitateur est rempli de données sur le fonctionnement du palais de justice, dont des listes de serviteurs et des comptes rendus d'exécutions. Ceux qui entrent dans ce bâtiment sont toujours plus nombreux que ceux qui en ressortent.
languages.original_text: The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing things such as the names of servants and details of executions. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.

traits.locale_text: Le cogitateur est rempli de données sur le fonctionnement du palais de justice, dont des listes de serviteurs et des comptes rendus d'exécutions. Ceux qui entrent dans ce bâtiment sont toujours plus nombreux que ceux qui en ressortent.

languages.text: 这台沉思者里装满了正义大殿的工作数据，记载着各种各样的详细资料，包括所有仆从的名字，以及所有人执行死刑的细节。活着走出这座大殿的人，始终比走进这座大殿的人要少。
languages.original_text: The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing things such as the names of servants and details of executions. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.

traits.locale_text: 这台沉思者里装满了正义大殿的工作数据，记载着各种各样的详细资料，包括所有仆从的名字，以及所有人执行死刑的细节。活着走出这座大殿的人，始终比走进这座大殿的人要少。

languages.text: El cogitador contiene datos sobre el funcionamiento del Palacio de la Justicia, incluyendo por ejemplo los nombres de los sirvientes y los detalles de las ejecuciones. El número de personas que entra al edificio siempre es menor que el que sale.
languages.original_text: The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing things such as the names of servants and details of executions. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.

traits.locale_text: El cogitador contiene datos sobre el funcionamiento del Palacio de la Justicia, incluyendo por ejemplo los nombres de los sirvientes y los detalles de las ejecuciones. El número de personas que entra al edificio siempre es menor que el que sale.

languages.text: 考算機には、使用人の名前や処刑の詳細など、司法宮の仕組みに関するデータが詰まっている。建物に入る者の数は、常に出る者の数を上回っている。
languages.original_text: The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing things such as the names of servants and details of executions. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.

traits.locale_text: 考算機には、使用人の名前や処刑の詳細など、司法宮の仕組みに関するデータが詰まっている。建物に入る者の数は、常に出る者の数を上回っている。

languages.text: Kavramsayar, Adalet Sarayı'nın işleyişine dair veriler içeriyor. Hizmetkârların isimlerinden infaz ayrıntılarına kadar her şey içinde kayıtlı. Binaya girenlerin sayısı, çıkanlardan daima fazla olarak kaydedilmiş.
languages.original_text: The cogitator is filled with data on the workings of the Palace of Justice, listing things such as the names of servants and details of executions. The number of people entering the building is always greater than that of those leaving it.

traits.locale_text: Kavramsayar, Adalet Sarayı'nın işleyişine dair veriler bulundurur. Hizmetkârların isimlerinden infaz ayrıntılarına kadar her şey kayıtlıdır. Binaya girenlerin sayısı çıkanlardan daima fazladır.
